snippet: The most deadly attack, at a crowded market in the Sadr City district, was claimed by the Islamic State. Two more bombings were reported at police checkpoints in the capital.
abstract: Iraqi authorities report deaths of over 90 people and wounding of many others following three bombings in three separate neighborhoods of Baghdad; Islamic State claims responsibility.

byline.original: By FALIH HASSAN and OMAR AL-JAWOSHY

lead_paragraph: The most deadly attack, at a crowded market in the Sadr City district, was claimed by the Islamic State. Two more bombings were reported at police checkpoints in the capital.

headline.main: Scores Are Killed as a Wave of Bombings Bloodies Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Scores Killed as Bombings Bloody 3 Parts of Baghdad

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
